ygData.subject: RE: [eqenchanters] Digest Number 297
ygData.msgSnippet: There are 8 messages in this issue. Topics in this digest: 1. RE: Digest Number 297 From: Andrew Collins  2. Re: RE: Digest Number
ygData.messageBody:
There are 8 messages in this issue.

Topics in this digest:

1. RE: Digest Number 297
From: Andrew Collins <ACollins@...>
2. Re: RE: Digest Number 297
From: "Daniel Devorkin" <devo@...>
3. RE: RE: Digest Number 297
From: "Treadway, Donald" <dtreadway@...>
4. RE: RE: Digest Number 297
From: "Whitcraft,David" <dwhitcraft@...>
5. Re: RE: Digest Number 297
From: "Daniel Devorkin" <devo@...>
6. RE: RE: Digest Number 297
From: "Adam S" <Madastep@...>
7. Re: Decking out my Enchanter
From: "Garett" <osmosis@...>
8. Re: Decking out my Enchanter
From: "Garett" <osmosis@...>


Now I understand that when reading your postings in Digest format, it is
possible to forget when replying, and to send the WHOLE digest out again...
it happens, I did it once, and posted a sorry.

What I am pissed about is that it was replied to FIVE FREAKING TIMES, and
none of you had the sense to trim the reply. I hate to break it too you,
but enchanter is the smartest class to play in all EQ. I can understand one
mistake, I can see past two, after that... ( deletes and does not continue
this thought )

Then, you begin to argue what robes are what...

Tham Robe, AC5, 3 Agi befallen... why would you wear this? 3 Agi is
less than what is needed to give you the AC6 of a silk robe, or a senior
robe
Gossamer AC8, from befallen, beautiful white color
Keeper AC8 2 Int... from temple of Ro
FBR AC8 3 Int, 5 sta from najena
Green silk drape, from one of the Sol Dungeons
SMR lower guk

also robe of ishiva and a few others that you will never see... Kunark
mostly.


Finally, Graffe has started posting the updates on his wizard site on the
wizard board... very nice. Any chance you can do the same Baelish? Make it
easier to see what is up.
